expo.name: FitTracker Pro
expo.description: World-class fitness tracking with AI-powered workouts, real-time coaching, and comprehensive health monitoring. Transform your fitness journey with personalized training programs, nutrition guidance, and social challenges.

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: FitTracker Pro uses the camera to capture progress photos and scan food barcodes for nutrition tracking.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: FitTracker Pro accesses your photo library to save progress photos and share achievements.
infoPlist.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: FitTracker Pro integrates with Apple Health to sync workout data, heart rate, and health metrics for comprehensive fitness tracking.
infoPlist.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: FitTracker Pro writes workout data to Apple Health to keep your fitness information synchronized across all your health apps.
infoPlist.NSMotionUsageDescription: FitTracker Pro uses motion sensors to automatically detect and track your workouts and daily activity.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: FitTracker Pro uses location to find nearby gyms, track outdoor workouts, and provide location-based fitness recommendations.

plugins.cameraPermission: FitTracker Pro uses the camera to capture progress photos and scan nutrition barcodes.

plugins.photosPermission: FitTracker Pro accesses photos to save progress images and share fitness achievements.
